name: Drops (Agnuss1)
description:
This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

In this game you controls 2 players and have to merge to get to the next level.

What will be added to the game:

-Multiplayer 

-more levels 

-more abilities 

-better UI

Install instructions

1: Download game.

2: Unzip folder.

3: Launch Tears.exe

Please Rate the game
